a.detail:
Net Trap: DC 10 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    affects all targets within a 10 ft. square area, DC 11 save or become restrained

c.detail:
Electrified Floortile: DC 15 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    affects all targets within a 10 ft. square area, DC 20 save or take 4d10 lightning damage

e.detail: A group of demonic faces have been carved into the walls
e.summary: A group of demonic faces have been carved into the walls

i.detail:
Teleporter Crystal: DC 15 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    affects each creature which touches the crystal, DC 10 save or be teleported to another location

m.detail: Someone has scrawled "Save yourself, kill the others" here
m.summary: Someone has scrawled "Save yourself, kill the others" here

n.detail:
Poison Gas Trap: DC 15 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    affects all targets within a 10 ft. square area, DC 13 save or take 2d10 poison damage

r.detail: The walls here have been engraved with strange symbols
r.summary: The walls here have been engraved with strange symbols

s.detail: The walls here have been engraved with incoherent labyrinths
s.summary: The walls here have been engraved with incoherent labyrinths

u.detail:
Concealed Pit: DC 10 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    affects all targets entering a 10 ft. square area, DC 15 save or take 2d10 damage

v.detail:
Idol of Evil: DC 15 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    affects good creatures which touch the idol, DC 12 save or take 2d10 damage

w.detail: A large demonic idol with ruby eyes sits in an alcove here
w.summary: A large demonic idol with ruby eyes sits in an alcove here

x.detail: The walls here have been engraved with alien symbols
x.summary: The walls here have been engraved with alien symbols

z.detail:
Falling Block: DC 10 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    affects all targets within a 10 ft. square area, DC 13 save or take 2d10 damage

details.history: The dungeon was created by worshippers of a good deity as a stronghold. It was eventually abandoned due to plague, and has fallen to ruin and been rebuilt many times since then.

detail.room_features: A chute descends from the room into the next dungeon level down, and a tapestry of an earth goddess hangs from the south wall
